The apps that work with cromecast are VERY LIMITED! Basically it's only good for Netflix n YouTube. It says you can strem from Google Crome browser but it lags so bad and doesn't work at all. Also my cromecast is always having problems connecting to a device. I have to constantly unplug it and reconnect to the wifi on the device and on the cromecast and it's a pain. I'd rather just use my wii or play station to watch Netflix and stuff
